system.description:
You blend subterfuge, guile, and magical scholarship in ways that keep your allies guessing and your enemies vexed—or dead. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Intelligence score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • You can cast spells with vocalized components in thieves’ cant. Observers who don’t also know thieves’ cant make all checks to identify or counter spells cast this way at disadvantage.

  • Your spellbook is encoded and cannot be read by anyone else.

  • You can read a full page of text in a single round. The time to copy new spells into your spellbook is cut in half.

  • When in a community of at least 3,000 residents, you can acquire spell components for spells you know through black-market channels for half price.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in rogue, 3 levels in wizard
